title: Find Your Way: A Busker's Documentary
actors: Sadie Ava, Chris Ballew, Joshua Bell, Ronn Benway
plot: This award-winning film explores themes of creativity and success through the lens of street music. It raises fascinating questions about the nature of context and how it can affect our perception of artistic worth. Using a richly woven fabric of raw footage, insightful interviews and a compelling soundtrack, Find Your Way prompts audiences to become more aware of how their own pre-conceptions of "what's good" can prevent them from appreciating something's natural beauty.
